item.description:
$5 for dinner to help me pay for my expenses for meal

Let's share Thanksgiving dinner together, I can fit 25 people in my community room in Wethersfield. I am making a 20 lb turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes, sweet potatoes, carrots, salad, green bean casserole and gravy, apple pie and ice cream just need your beverage, appetizer or dessert. Questions, Please call or email me

thanks

Nancy

5083803737
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my address to those that say yes

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Celebrate thanksgiving together
